sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionID,Acquisition,AcquisitionCode,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Acquisition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,VariableTypeID,NoHeads,NoSamples,NoPositions,EntryOrder,Formula, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionStatusID,ActionStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCycleCountID,AssetID,RfDayPeriodID,Count,AssetCountTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCycleCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,TargetSampleSize,RfAttrStudyTypeID,Instructions,ImageURI,NoHeads,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVAttribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CauseActionID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedCauseActionID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CostCentreID,CostCentre,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CostCentre WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DepartmentID,Name,DepartmentGroup,Classification1,PlantID,DepartmentCode,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Department WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultStateID,FaultID,FromDT,ToDT,FaultStatusID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedFaultStateID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryAtLocationID,LocationID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedInvAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineGroupID,LineGroup,LineGroupCode,Description,OEETarget,WasteTarget,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionVariantID,Sequence,LkAGAVID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkAGAV WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkConcernRootCauseID,RootCauseID,ConcernID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernRootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIProcID,WorkInstructionProcedureID,DocumentID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLocationMachineStageId,MachineStageId,LocationId,IsLocationIn,IsLocationOut, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLocationMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartID,UnitID,LkPartUnitID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKPartUnit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolTypeID,OperationTypeID,MaxNoTools,LkToolTypeOpTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkToolTypeOpType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRBuildRecordID,WorkInstructionResultID,BuildRecordID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRBuildRecord WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageInvPositionId,MachineStageId,Position,PositionNumber, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageInvPosition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHoursID,MaintenanceWorkID,WorkerLoginID,ActualManHours,RevisionNo,IsEdited,ModifiedDT,SupplierID,SupplierCost,PersonnelGroupID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHours WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintenanceProcedureID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,LoginID,ModifiedDT,RevisedMaintProcID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureRevision WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,AssetID,RfPeriodTypeID,StartDate,AssetCountTypeID,EBAReference,IsEdited,LoginID,ModifiedDT,CalendarN1,CalendarN2,CalendarN3,CounterThreshold1,CounterThreshold2,CounterThreshold3,EstimatedCountPerDay,RunHourThreshold1,RunHourThreshold2,RunHourThreshold3,EstimatedRunHoursPerDay,EstimatedEventsPerDay,RevisionNo,IsRetired,PriorExecutions, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintProcScheduleOnAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime_Buffer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCItemID,OPCServerID,OPCGroupID,TagName,TagAddress,RfOPCItemTypeID,IsNotify,RawValue,UpdatedDT,Quality,Value,LastRawValue,LastUpdatedDT,LastQuality,LastValue,MachineStageID,ChangeAction,PLCID,IsDatedOnServer,IsStoredAsArray,IsActive,MachineStageEventTypeID,RfTransitionTypeID,TransitionToValue, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItem WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCSpeedID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCSpeed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartSubClassificationID,PartSubClassification,PartClassificationID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartSubClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductionStopReasonID,ProductionStopReason,Description,StopCode,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,RfStopRelativeToJobID,IsPlanned,IsDefaultNoJobReason,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonID,ScrapReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartControlLimitID,SPCChartComponentID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,FromDT,ToDT,RangeToDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RangeFromDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefID,TagOwnerID,RfTable,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagProfileID,Name, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,JobID,AcquisitionContextID,Checks_Done, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Checks_Done WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolAtLocationID,LocationID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedToolAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolTypeID,ToolType,ToolTypeCode,Description,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeClassID,VariableTypeClass,Description,Priority, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeClass WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Job.JobID, Job.WOID, Job.RfJobStatusID, Job.DeadlineDT, Job.ActualStartDT, Job.ActualEndDT, Job.PlannedStartDT, Job.PlannedEndDT, Job.PlannedDuration, Job.EstimatedStartDT, Job.EstimatedEndDT, Job.EstimatedDuration, Job.ScheduledSequence, Job.LineID, Job.ProductionStartDT, Job.ProductionEndDT, Job.TheoreticalCycleTime, Job.BudgetChangeOver, Job.QuantityOrdered, Job.IsCalculated, Job.LineGroupID, Job_.JobInstructions, Job_.ReleaseDT, Job_.ReleaseLoginID, Job_.StartLoginID, Job_.EndLoginID, Job_.Comments, Job_.ModifiedDt, Job_.ModifiedLoginID, Job_.StoppedReason, Job_.SkippedReason, Job_.SkippedDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM Job FULL JOIN Job_ ON (Job.JobID = Job_.JobID) FULL JOIN Job_Custom ON (Job.JobID = Job_Custom.JobID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WO.WOID, WO.WONumber, WO.RunNo, WO.PartID, WO.QuantityOrdered, WO.RfJobStatusID, WO.DeadlineDT, WO.ActualStartDT, WO.ActualEndDT, WO.PlannedStartDT, WO.PlannedEndDT, WO.EstimatedStartDT, WO.EstimatedEndDT, WO.CustomerID, WO.IsDiscrete, WO.Reference1, WO.Reference2, WO.Reference3, WO.Reference4, WO.Reference5, WO.WORefID, WO_.CustomerOrderNo, WO_.LabelsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerLayer, WO_.LayersPerInventoryPack, WO_.PackingCode, WO_.LabelTemplate, WO_.LabelColour, WO_.EANCode, WO_.CusStartNum, WO_.CusEndNum, WO_.CustomerPartNo, WO_.CustomerPartDescription, WO_.LabelText1, WO_.LabelText2, WO_.LabelText3, WO_.PrinterURL, WO_.BOMVariantID, WO_custom.BaseWONumber, WO_custom.Txn_date, WO_custom.Wip_Entity_ID, WO_custom.Alternate_Bom, WO_custom.WO_Status, WO_custom.IsBtoCto, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM WO FULL JOIN WO_ ON (WO.WOID = WO_.WOID) FULL JOIN WO_custom ON (WO.WOID = WO_custom.WOID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
